document.full_text: john-patrick smith, tennessee's leader in career victories, is making a final run at the n.c.a.a. singles, doubles and team titles before he will consider whether to turn professional.
document.title: title remains elusive for tennessee's smith as victories pile up
lines_and_colors: john-patrick smith, tennessee's leader in career victories, is making a final run at the n.c.a.a. singles, doubles and team titles before he will consider whether to turn professional.
